company_context: Intelligent Data Analytics Software - Sisense Skip to Main Content Menu Demo Data analytics platform Analytics that make sense Sisense is an AI-powered analytics platform that helps teams model, visualize, and embed data experiences—now with tools like assistant and MCP server to speed up creation and deliver insights where users work. Try free Learn more Bridge the gap between insights and action Sisense Intelligence, our suite of AI features, helps app creators and developers deliver smarter, embedded analytics that guide users to better, faster decisions, right where they work. Build smarter, in less time Whether you’re designing new dashboards or embedding analytics into your product, Sisense Intelligence simplifies every step with intuitive, AI-powered tools. Use assistant to build analytics using natural language, and accelerate delivery with reusable SDK components. Learn more × Go from data to insights in minutes Sisense Intelligence makes analytics accessible to everyone . Features like assistant and narrative turn complex data into clear summaries and visualizations, instantly. Ask questions in natural language and explore governed data, without needing a technical background. Learn more × Embed with precision and flexibility With Compose SDK and assistant integration, developers can embed AI-powered, conversational analytics that adapt to your app’s architecture. Maintain design control while giving users a seamless, intelligent experience. Learn more Accelerate innovation with predictive analytics Move beyond traditional BI. Use Sisense Intelligence to access real-time insights, as well as anticipate what’s next with features like forecast and trend. Uncover patterns, surface anomalies, and help your users stay ahead of the curve. Get started today Report Accelerating embedded analytics: From build vs. buy to hybrid solutions Learn more Blog The top 10 embedded analytics platforms Learn more Webinar Demo series: Design dashboards your users will want to use Learn more Report AI-powered analytics: How decision-making will transform by 2027 Learn more Case study How Measuremen transformed workplace analytics with Sisense Learn more Report The shift from BI dashboards to embedded insights: What 500+ data leaders are doing next Learn more "At the end of the day, we aren’t in the analytics business, it made sense to bring in the experts." —Scott Olson VP of Engineering, Bigtincan Read the Bigtincan case study "We went from custom application development to the ability to rapidly change something on the dashboard and then publish it again in real-time within the production environment—without sacrificing any of the security. That really helped us level up." -Devin Vyain Senior Solutions Architect, Barrios Read the Barrios case study “We’re trying to enable our teams and coaches around the country to think in new ways and to look at data in different ways, and Sisense is helping us to do that.” -Patrick Murphy Senior Director of Data and Pro

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Emily and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours make better decisions with their data. Can you tell me a little bit about your current data analytics setup?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, hi Emily. We're actually using Sisense for our data analytics needs. It's been working well for us so far, but we're always open to exploring new solutions. What makes DeepData AI unique?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's great to hear that you're using Sisense! DeepData AI actually complements Sisense quite well. Our solution focuses on processing large datasets quickly and efficiently, which can help you get more out of your Sisense investment. We've seen companies like yours reduce their data processing time by up to 70% with our solution.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: That sounds interesting, but I have to say that we've just implemented Sisense and we're still in the process of getting everything set up. I'm not sure if we're ready to add another solution to the mix right now. Plus, I'd have to get approval from our procurement team, and that can take some time.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand that you're in the middle of implementing Sisense, and I appreciate your honesty about the procurement process. However, I'd like to propose a pilot project that can help you see the value of DeepData AI without a large upfront commitment. We've had success with similar companies in the past, and I think it could be worth exploring.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, but to be honest, our budget for this quarter is already allocated, and I'm not sure if we can fit in another project. We're also exploring some other solutions, like Tableau and Power BI, so we'd need to compare the costs and benefits of each option.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand that budget can be a constraint, and I'd be happy to discuss pricing with you in more detail. However, I think DeepData AI can offer some unique benefits that might be worth considering, even if it's just a small pilot project to start.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Emily, I appreciate your persistence, but I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI for now. Could you please send me an email with some more information about your solution, and we can revisit this conversation in the future if our needs change? I appreciate your understanding.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely, I'd be happy to send over some more information. Is there anything specific you'd like me to include in the email?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: No, that's okay. Just a general overview of your solution and some case studies would be great. Thank you for your time, Emily, and I wish you the best of luck with your sales efforts.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Timing
Feedback: The seller should have more aggressively addressed the buyer's timing concerns and explored potential workarounds or temporary solutions to keep the conversation alive. Sentiment: Neutral
